descriptionHTML:
Model Number: FR-B-01
Have a look at the Bundle Pack of Frillroid's FR-B01 Analogue Watchface

If you are a fan of a Classic and Elegant Analogue Watches then this Luxurious Smart Watchface Bundle is just made for you. This bundle includes four unique analogue Watchfaces for your smart watch. These watch faces are designed keeping in mind the classic look for all of your smart watches like Moto 360, Zen and others. It has analogue design that displays variety of features, making your way easy to getting rid of your hassle of taking out and putting back in your mobile phone every now and then for the simplest of features.

Key Feature:-
• 4 Beautiful Analogue design
• Displays Date/Day
• Beautiful blue background
• Remaining battery life of your device so you exactly know when to charge

This watch face is designed for Round and Square display Watches so you can use it with any android smart watch.

How it works?
Its simple just download the app to your smartphone and sync it with the watch. The watch face that you will choose will be displayed on your watch screen.
comments: Please Help Unable to change faces. Nexus 6 and Moto 360. So far STILL no help regarding my problem.
best this is the best bundle offer on watchfaces. very classic and elegant designs
